description:
DroidCam turns your phone and tablet into a webcam for your PC. Use it with chat programs like Zoom, Microsoft Teams and Skype.
		If this package isn't up-to-date for some days, please [create an issue](https://github.com/RalfEs73/chocolatey-packages/issues/new/choose).
summary: DroidCam turns your phone and tablet into a webcam for your PC.
author: Dev47Apps
